collectible.title: Roll Buster
collectible.subtitle: The buster in which Roll used to use, way back when...
collectible.text: Roll's buster from when she used to fight in those various events, such as the Marvel one, or the one adventure she had with her brother, in which Wily kidnapped all the other Robot Masters. Again.

collectible.title: Joe's Helmet
collectible.subtitle: The helmet of a hero long forgotten, long deceased.
collectible.text: His sacrifice will not be in vain, she'll make sure of it. Her brothers might not believe anymore, yet she knows there truly are still heroes left in man. She just needs to find them.
collectible.unlock: Sometimes, Roll will spout references to an alternate universe in appropriate circumstances.

collectible.title: Roll's Really Ruined Rump Roast
collectible.subtitle: Probably should've turned that oven off...
collectible.text: Oh ye gods! My roast is ruined! But what if, I were to purchase fast food and disguise it as my own cooking? Ohoho, delightfully devillish Roll-chan!
